{"blocks":[{"key":"7l73u","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"c4l19","text":"The Sequencing Read Archive (SRA) https://www.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/sra/ is the primary repository of raw whole genome sequencing data.  You can access records at SRA by typing laboratory identifiers ( strain, isolate name alias, FDA_Lab_ID, BioProjects) or specific attributes in the search box.   Identifiers might need to be separated by  \" OR \" e.g. -CFSAN0001 OR CFSAN0002 OR CFSAN0003.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":34,"length":33}],"data":{}},{"key":"b6fq8","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"cjghq","text":"You can export SRA accessions by clicking at the Send to bottom and choosing file and the accession list format.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":49,"length":8},{"style":"bold","offset":77,"length":4},{"style":"bold","offset":90,"length":14}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"40p1","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"7gf2i","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"2l04f","text":" ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":1,"offset":0,"length":1}],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"link","mutability":"","data":{"guid":"07094435470F11ECB0AB0A58A9FEAC02","url":"https://www.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/sra"}},"1":{"type":"image","mutability":"","data":{"guid":"92544630471311EC8F01EB8D19EE1BA8","height":415,"id":209967,"is_video":false,"legend":{"blocks":[{"data":{},"depth":0,"entityRanges":[],"inlineStyleRanges":[{"length":12,"offset":0,"style":"bold"}],"key":"1919g","text":"Figure 6:   Downloading SRA accessions from NCBI SRA.","type":"unstyled"}],"entityMap":{}},"mime":"image/png","original_name":"image.png","placeholder":"https://s3.amazonaws.com/protocols-files/files/gpbt9zje.jpg","source":"https://s3.amazonaws.com/protocols-files/files/gpbr9zje.jpg","type":1,"webp_placeholder":"https://s3.amazonaws.com/protocols-files/files/gpbs9zje.webp","webp_source":"https://s3.amazonaws.com/protocols-files/files/gpbq9zje.webp","width":550}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"4l92o","text":"BioSample (https://www.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/biosample/ ) is the database for the isolate or sample metadata.  Users access biosample records at using the search box and typing laboratory identifiers ( strain, isolate name alias, FDA_Lab_ID, BioProjects) or specific attributes  separated by \" OR \" e.g. \"CFSAN0001 OR CFSAN0002 OR CFSAN0003\" \"Salmonella enterica\".  ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":150,"length":10}],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":11,"length":39}],"data":{}},{"key":"8pmr1","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"6g7k5","text":"  ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":1,"offset":0,"length":1}],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"link","mutability":"","data":{"guid":"D98ABFEB465211ECB0AB0A58A9FEAC02","url":"https://www.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/biosample"}},"1":{"type":"image","mutability":"","data":{"guid":"F09BDE60466911ECAE3483424CC02511","height":318,"id":209971,"is_video":false,"legend":{"blocks":[{"data":{},"depth":0,"entityRanges":[],"inlineStyleRanges":[{"length":11,"offset":0,"style":"bold"}],"key":"aa5om","text":"Figure 3:  Searching records in BioSample","type":"unstyled"}],"entityMap":{}},"mime":"image/png","original_name":"image.png","placeholder":"https://s3.amazonaws.com/protocols-files/files/gpbx9zje.jpg","source":"https://s3.amazonaws.com/protocols-files/files/gpbv9zje.jpg","type":1,"webp_placeholder":"https://s3.amazonaws.com/protocols-files/files/gpbw9zje.webp","webp_source":"https://s3.amazonaws.com/protocols-files/files/gpbu9zje.webp","width":550}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"2s9tj","text":"You can download a combination of sample/isolate and sequencing metadata in a tab-delimited file using Run Selector (https://www.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/Traces/study/). {"blocks":[{"key":"lafm","text":"If you need to download multiple assembled genomes, access the NCBI Assembly resource (https://www.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/assembly/).   Enter the identifiers in the search box and click in the \"Download Assemblies\" button.   In the left side of this interface, you can refine your search by applying multiple filters.  For more details on programatically download genomes from NCBI visit https://www.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/genome/doc/ftpfaq/.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":87,"length":38},{"key":1,"offset":382,"length":47}],"data":{}},{"key":"domne","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"o5ua","text":"  ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":2,"offset":0,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"6lgft","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"f7p2i","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"link","mutability":"","data":{"guid":"3ADF7D76470D11ECB0AB0A58A9FEAC02","url":"https://www.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/assembly"}},"1":{"type":"link","mutability":"","data":{"guid":"5204B34D470C11ECB0AB0A58A9FEAC02","url":"https://www.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/genome/doc/ftpfaq"}},"2":{"type":"image","mutability":"","data":{"guid":"2C7F2600470D11EC8F01EB8D19EE1BA8","height":349,"id":209983,"is_video":false,"legend":{"blocks":[{"data":{},"depth":0,"entityRanges":[],"inlineStyleRanges":[{"length":11,"offset":0,"style":"bold"}],"key":"7een8","text":"Figure 8:  Downloading assemblies from NCBI Assembly ","type":"unstyled"}],"entityMap":{}},"mime":"image/png","original_name":"image.png","placeholder":"https://s3.amazonaws.com/protocols-files/files/gpcb9zje.jpg","source":"https://s3.amazonaws.com/protocols-files/files/gpb99zje.jpg","type":1,"webp_placeholder":"https://s3.amazonaws.com/protocols-files/files/gpca9zje.webp","webp_source":"https://s3.amazonaws.com/protocols-files/files/gpb89zje.webp","width":550}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"fvoeq","text":"BioProject is a collection of biological data related to a surveillance or research effort.   Umbrella bioprojects contain several data-level projects.   PRJNA593772 ( https://www.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/bioproject/593772)  comprises a set of umbrella bioprojects, each established for a pathogen being sequenced by the GenomeTrakr network.  If you need to find a BioProjects for an specific organism processed by your lab, click at the corresponding organism umbrella Bioproject.  ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":168,"length":46}],"data":{}},{"key":"7eej1","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"6jjbc","text":"  ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":1,"offset":0,"length":1}],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"link","mutability":"","data":{"guid":"72AAFB06471111ECB0AB0A58A9FEAC02","url":"https://www.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/bioproject/593772"}},"1":{"type":"image","mutability":"","data":{"guid":"5D4C7270471111EC8F01EB8D19EE1BA8","height":232,"id":209987,"is_video":false,"legend":{"blocks":[{"data":{},"depth":0,"entityRanges":[],"inlineStyleRanges":[{"length":10,"offset":0,"style":"bold"}],"key":"e84u","text":"Figure 2:  GenomeTrakr Umbrella BioProjects ","type":"unstyled"}],"entityMap":{}},"mime":"image/png","original_name":"image.png","placeholder":"https://s3.amazonaws.com/protocols-files/files/gpcf9zje.jpg","source":"https://s3.amazonaws.com/protocols-files/files/gpcd9zje.jpg","type":1,"webp_placeholder":"https://s3.amazonaws.com/protocols-files/files/gpce9zje.webp","webp_source":"https://s3.amazonaws.com/protocols-files/files/gpcc9zje.webp","width":550}}}}

","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":79,"length":28}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"5pfus","text":"    ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"52pcv","text":"The data from biosample can be downloaded by clicking the send to icon and choosing the destination of the file (summary, full text, full XML, biosample ID list or Accessions list).
